short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleaner, simpler, easier bookmarks! Access your saved collections of websites with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pager offers the functionality of bookmarks with a quick, modern, and minimalist UI. Save your most visited sites in different collections at the touch of a button and open groups of sites with ease.

No more distracting bookmarks bar littering your browser. Simply pin the extension and click the icon whenever you want to access your sites. Add, delete, and rename sites quickly without needing extra clicks or separate pages.
